body_html:
Would be very awesome to have this feature!
I've compared a resnet18 on two different input method:

  1. Use a constant variable on GPU (not useful in practice)
  2. Use a dequeued tensor, and having a Python thread running enqueue op in a loop.

In my experiment (1) is about 10% faster than (2).

btw, convnet-benchmarks use (1) to benchmark tensorflow.

body:
Would be very awesome to have this feature!
I've compared a resnet18 on two different input method:
1. Use a constant variable on GPU (not useful in practice)
2. Use a dequeued tensor, and having a Python thread running enqueue op in a loop.

In my experiment (1) is about 10% faster than (2).

btw, [convnet-benchmarks](https://github.com/soumith/convnet-benchmarks) use (1) to benchmark tensorflow.
